properties.body:
BRAZIL-EAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V RAMFORM VALIANT
   TOWING TEN 9000 METER LONG CABLES:
   A. 01, 02 AND 06 APR IN AREA BOUND BY
      14-03.23S 038-06.47W, 13-31.57S 037-36.35W,
      14-09.07S 036-56.32W, 14-40.57S 037-24.83W.
   B. 03 THRU 05 APR IN AREA BOUND BY
      13-03.12S 038-15.82W, 13-07.45S 038-24.70W,
      13-13.33S 038-32.58W, 13-15.00S 038-33.12W,
      13-27.45S 038-42.25W, 13-34.87S 038-39.85W,
      13-19.73S 038-08.90W, 13-05.37S 038-13.10W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 548/11.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 07 APR.
